datasource.oracle.driverClassName=oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver#datasource.oracle.url=jdbc:oracle:thin:@210.35.207.74:1521:dcdbdatasource.oracle.url=jdbc:oracle:thin:@20.1.1.5:1521:sspu2datasource.oracle.username=Infoiddatasource.oracle.password=EPB77*****
